Detailed Description

Strategy.h is a top-level construct for ASE. Most strategies extend it. It contains methods and variables to start, stop, pause, resume and restart the strategy.

Author:
David Johan Christensen, Modular Robotics Lab, AdapTronics Group, Maersk Institute, University of Southern Denmark
Note:
This software is distributed under the BSD open-source license.
